item.description:
Its still spring weather, but those of us who cant wait to get out or like to warm up for the season, lets start kayaking this weekend. This location is a *beautiful* place to kayak, very green, calm waters, perfect for a quick trip of an hour or two on the river. Its near green line, I can give a  ride from T. You may need a sweater or spring jacket to keep comfortably warm.

 

Loc:

2401 Commonwealth Avenue (Route 30)
Newton (Auburndale), Massachusetts

Fee:

The usual meetup fee and rental charges for the kayak/canoe (or you may bring yours). The rentals are around $15-$18 /hr, can be less if you share kayak/canoe.

Other :

There are nice sandwich shops nearby in newton (few miles), if you are looking to grab some before the trip.
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet at the kayak rental shop beside the river. There is additional car parking down the bridge on other side of river.
item.name: Kayak or canoe at charles river / newton
